a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Fertility rate vs. wanted fertility rate, 1960 to 2021
The fertility rate, expressed as the number of children per woman, is based on age-specific fertility rates in one
particular year. The wanted fertility is an estimate of what the total fertility rate would be if all unwanted births were
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
